description: [FIN13](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1016) has used `nslookup` and `ipconfig` for network reconnaissance efforts. [FIN13](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1016) has also utilized a compromised Symantec Altiris console and LanDesk account to retrieve network information.(Citation: Mandiant FIN13 Aug 2022)(Citation: Sygnia Elephant Beetle Jan 2022)

external_references.description: Sygnia Incident Response Team. (2022, January 5). TG2003: ELEPHANT BEETLE UNCOVERING AN ORGANIZED FINANCIAL-THEFT OPERATION. Retrieved February 9, 2023.
Ta, V., et al. (2022, August 8). FIN13: A Cybercriminal Threat Actor Focused on Mexico. Retrieved February 9, 2023.
